item.title: 41 things to do in 41 days to boost your digital marketing
item.description: [typography font=”Special Elite” size=”25″ size_format=”px”]Want a quick head start to a digital marketing plan for your brand or business? Here are 41 things you can do … over 41 days.[/typography] Allow an hour a day (and a bit extra at the end of the week to see how you’re progressing). Create an account on Twitter for you and your brand – find some friends to follow Create an account on Facebook Create a social media analytics account on MarketMeSuite to monitor your fans and followers Create a Google Alert to track online mentions of your brand Create a Google Alert for mentions of your product Create a Google Alert for mentions of your competitors Create a Google Alert for mentions of you Find out what Web Analytics Tools you use like Google Analytics & Bit.
